Detailed Description

FMODScene Implementation of the ISystemScene interface. The sound scene contains all the sound objects and info relevent to all sounds.

void FMODScene::Update ( f32  DeltaTime  )  [protected, virtual]

Parameters:

System::Changes::BitMask FMODScene::GetDesiredSystemChanges ( void   )  [protected, virtual]

Implementation of the ISystemScene::GetDesiredSystemChanges function. Returns a bit mask of System Changes that this scene wants to receive changes for. Used to inform the change control manager if this scene should be informed of the change.
